Interface PresenceModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface PresenceModel

    • Method Detail

      • getBasicStatus

        PresenceBasicStatus getBasicStatus()
        Gets the basic status of a presence model.
        Returns:
        The #BasicStatus of the #PresenceModel object.

      • setBasicStatus

        int setBasicStatus(PresenceBasicStatus basic_status)
        Sets the basic status of a presence model.
        Parameters:
        basic_status - The #BasicStatus to set for the #PresenceModel object.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

      • getTimestamp

        long getTimestamp()
        Gets the timestamp of a presence model.
        Returns:
        The timestamp of the #LinphonePresenceModel object or -1 on error.

      • getContact

        java.lang.String getContact()
        Gets the contact of a presence model.
        Returns:
        A string containing the contact, or null if no contact is found.

      • setContact

        void setContact(java.lang.String contact)
        Sets the contact of a presence model.
        Parameters:
        contact - The contact string to set.

      • getActivity

        PresenceActivity getActivity()
        Gets the first activity of a presence model (there is usually only one).
        Returns:
        A #PresenceActivity object if successful, null otherwise.

      • setActivity

        int setActivity(PresenceActivityType activity,
                java.lang.String description)
        Sets the activity of a presence model (limits to only one activity).
        Parameters:
        activity - The #PresenceActivityType to set for the model.
        description - An additional description of the activity to set for the model. Can be null if no additional description is to be added.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. WARNING: This method will modify the basic status of the model according to the activity being set. If you don't want the basic status to be modified automatically, you can use the combination of setBasicStatus(), clearActivities() and addActivity().

      • getNbActivities

        long getNbActivities()
        Gets the number of activities included in the presence model.
        Returns:
        The number of activities included in the #PresenceModel object.

      • getNthActivity

        PresenceActivity getNthActivity(long idx)
        Gets the nth activity of a presence model.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the activity to get (the first activity having the index 0).
        Returns:
        A #PresenceActivity object if successful, null otherwise.

      • addActivity

        int addActivity(PresenceActivity activity)
        Adds an activity to a presence model.
        Parameters:
        activity - The #PresenceActivity to add to the model.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

      • clearActivities

        int clearActivities()
        Clears the activities of a presence model.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

      • getNote

        PresenceNote getNote(java.lang.String lang)
        Gets the first note of a presence model (there is usually only one).
        Parameters:
        lang - The language of the note to get. Can be null to get a note that has no language specified or to get the first note whatever language it is written into.
        Returns:
        A #PresenceNote object if successful, null otherwise.

      • addNote

        int addNote(java.lang.String note_content,
            java.lang.String lang)
        Adds a note to a presence model.
        Parameters:
        note_content - The note to be added to the presence model.
        lang - The language of the note to be added. Can be null if no language is to be specified for the note.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. Only one note for each language can be set, so e.g. setting a note for the 'fr' language if there is only one will replace the existing one.

      • clearNotes

        int clearNotes()
        Clears all the notes of a presence model.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

      • getNbServices

        long getNbServices()
        Gets the number of services included in the presence model.
        Returns:
        The number of services included in the #PresenceModel object.

      • getNthService

        PresenceService getNthService(long idx)
        Gets the nth service of a presence model.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the service to get (the first service having the index 0).
        Returns:
        A #PresenceService object if successful, null otherwise.

      • addService

        int addService(PresenceService service)
        Adds a service to a presence model.
        Parameters:
        service - The #PresenceService object to add to the model.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

      • getNthPerson

        PresencePerson getNthPerson(long idx)
        Gets the nth person of a presence model.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the person to get (the first person having the index 0).
        Returns:
        A pointer to a #PresencePerson object if successful, null otherwise.
